alert.note: Alert for Chattooga; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:46PM EST until January 17 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT EST SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with lesser amounts in the valleys. The majority of the snowfall is anticipated Sunday, with just a mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow possible after midnight tonight. Gusty winds of 20 to 35 mph at times will accompany the wintry precipitation. * WHERE...Dade, Walker and Chattooga Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight EST Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and drive with caution.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
